title: Job Vacancies at Primovet Engineering Limited
content:
Primovet Engineering Limited is a proactive engineering construction company built on a culture of excellence and innovation.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Surveyor

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	We are seeking a detail-oriented and experienced Surveyor to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for measuring land features, preparing survey reports, and ensuring that all measurements meet the required specifications and legal standards.


Key Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Conduct land, building, and topographical surveys using modern surveying instruments and software.
	Prepare accurate maps, reports, and survey drawings.
	Establish boundaries and prepare legal descriptions for land parcels.
	Collaborate with engineers, architects, and project managers to ensure project accuracy.
	Maintain surveying equipment and ensure proper calibration.
	Comply with relevant laws, codes, and safety standards.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess a B.Sc./HND in Surveying, Geoinformatics, or related field.
	Minimum of 5 years of professional surveying experience.
	Proficiency in using GPS, Total Station, AutoCAD, and other surveying tools.
	Strong mathematical, analytical, and problem-solving skills.
	Excellent communication and teamwork abilities.
	Valid professional license or registration (where applicable).


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: royalrecruitment77@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

 

2.) Admin / Head of Operation

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	We are seeking a proactive, highly organized, and results-driven Admin/ Head of Operations to oversee our day-to-day administrative functions and operational processes.


Key Responsibilities


	Lead, supervise, and coordinate the work of engineers, architects, storekeepers, and administrative staff.
	Oversee the entire operational flow from project initiation to completion.
	Implement and enforce operational policies, systems, and procedures for maximum efficiency.
	Monitor project timelines, budgets, and resource allocation.
	Serve as the link between management and operations teams to ensure smooth communication and execution.
	Drive operational excellence through proactive problem-solving and leadership.


Requirements


	Minimum of 5 years of proven experience in admin/operations management, preferably in the engineering/construction sector.
	Strong leadership and people management skills with the ability to coordinate multidisciplinary teams.
	Excellent organizational, communication, and decision-making abilities.
	Proficiency in MS Office Suite and other relevant tools.
	Preferably Females.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: royalrecruitment77@gmail.com using "Admin/Head of Operations" as the subject of the mail.

 

 

3.) Business Development Manager

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Summary


	We are seeking a driven and strategic Business Development Manager to spearhead our growth initiatives, expand our client base, and strengthen our market presence.
	This is a leadership role for someone who thrives on building partnerships and delivering results.


Key Responsibilities


	Identify, develop, and secure new business opportunities in the engineering and construction sector.
	Build and maintain strong relationships with clients, partners, and stakeholders.
	Develop winning proposals, bids, and presentations for prospective projects.
	Monitor market trends and competitors to identify new areas for growth.
	Collaborate with operations and technical teams to ensure successful project delivery.
	Represent the company at industry events, exhibitions, and networking activities.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess a Bachelor`s / Master’s Degree
	Minimum of 5 years of proven experience in business development, sales, or marketing, preferably in the engineering or construction industry.
	Strong negotiation, presentation, and communication skills.
	Ability to work independently and meet revenue targets.
	Proven track record of closing deals and driving business growth.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send CV to: royalrecruitment77@gmail.com using "Business Development Manager" as the subject of the mail.

title: Job Openings at Grand Towers Limited
content:
Grand Towers Limited is a dynamic and forward-thinking private equity firm that prides itself on identifying and investing in high-potential opportunities across a diverse range of industries. With a keen eye for emerging trends and a commitment to strategic partnerships, Grand towers has built a robust and dynamic investment portfolio, spanning fintech, hospitality, real estate, communication, and financial information sectors.

We are recruiting to fill the following position below:

1.) General Manager

Job Location: Anambra
Job Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Oversee daily operations, ensuring exceptional guest experiences.
	Manage and mentor hotel staff, fostering a positive work environment.
	Develop and implement strategic plans to achieve financial and operational goals.
	Ensure compliance with health and safety regulations.
	Cultivate relationships with guests, stakeholders, and local businesses.


Qualifications


	Degree in Hospitality Management or related field is preferred.
	Minimum of 5 years of experience in hotel management, specifically in five-star establishments.
	Strong leadership and communication skills.
	Proven financial acumen and experience in budget management.
	Exceptional problem-solving abilities and a guest-centric approach.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and a Cover Letter to: info@grandtowersco.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

2.) Internal Auditor

Job Location: Abuja

Responsibilities


	Conduct internal audits, ensure compliance with company policies, identify risks, and recommend improvements to enhance operational efficiency and accuracy.


Requirements


	Experience: 2 years of relevant experience
	Requirements: Attention to detail, knowledge of audit standards, and strong problem-solving skills.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: info@grandtowersco.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note: If you meet the criteria and are excited to join a leading hospitality team, apply now.

 

3.) Junior Accountant Officer

Job Location: Lagos
Job Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities


	Assist in maintaining financial records and ledgers
	Prepare basic financial reports and reconciliations
	Support day-to-day accounting operations
	Assist in tracking expenses, budgets, and petty cash
	Ensure compliance with internal control policies and regulatory standards


Requirements


	HND / BSc in Accounting, Finance, or related discipline
	0–2 years of relevant work experience
	Proficiency in Microsoft Excel and accounting software
	Strong attention to detail and organizational skills
	Good communication and teamwork abilities.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and a Cover Letter to: info@grandtowersco.com using "Junior Accountant" as the subject of the mail.

Internal Auditor Job at Levitikal Group




        
    

        
        Levitikal Group is a leading conglomerate driving progress and development across Nigeria. With a diverse portfolio spanning real estate, construction, energy, agriculture, and hospitality, we are committed to delivering exceptional value to our stakeholders.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Internal Auditor

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description
     

            
    




	The Internal Auditor Officer is responsible for conducting independent and objective evaluations of the organization’s financial, operational, and compliance processes to ensure effectiveness, accuracy, and adherence to policies, laws, and regulations.
	The role helps identify risks, recommend improvements, and promote efficient use of resources.


Responsibilities


	Assist in developing annual audit plans based on risk assessments.
	Conduct audits of financial, operational, and compliance activities across departments.
	Review and assess the adequacy of internal controls, policies, and procedures.
	Gather, analyze, and document audit evidence.
	Prepare working papers to support audit findings.
	Test internal controls and identify weaknesses or areas for improvement.
	Ensure adherence to regulatory requirements, company policies, and industry best practices.
	Identify and evaluate potential risks that could impact operations or compliance.
	Prepare clear and concise audit reports highlighting findings, risks, and recommendations.
	Present audit results to management and follow up on agreed corrective actions.
	Recommend process enhancements to improve efficiency, effectiveness, and risk mitigation.
	Stay updated on changes in auditing standards, regulations, and industry trends.


Qualifications


	Intersted candidates should possess a Bachelor's Degree with 4-7 years of experience.
